Determines whether comments are included.

summary.span: 尚未實作這個方法。

span.span: This method is not yet implemented.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 開始讀取要從提供的資料流讀取至這個讀取器的 XML 標準八位元資料組，直到進行符合 `EndCanonicalization` 呼叫為止。Start reading the canonical octets of the XML being read to this reader from the supplied stream until the matching `EndCanonicalization` call is made. 從主要讀取器資料流讀取的內容不會受到此呼叫的影響。The content read from the main reader stream is unaffected by this call. `includeComments` 會定義註解是否納入標準輸入中，且 `inclusivePrefixes` 會提供當做獨佔標準化演算法內含前置詞的前置詞清單。`includeComments` defines whether comments are to be included in the canonical input and `inclusivePrefixes` provides the list of prefixes to be treated as inclusive prefixes with the exclusive canonicalization algorithm.

span.span: Always.
